description: Unlock the existing product from SAP, keeping the existing one

common_parameters.name: partner_id
common_parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned when registration is successful. Required for all requests.

common_parameters.name: timestamp
common_parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for signature authentication.

common_parameters.name: access_token
common_parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to use, take API number use and expires in 2 hours

common_parameters.name: msg_id
common_parameters.description: Shopeee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for flow API.

common_parameters.name: sign
common_parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api_path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened

response_parameters.name: warning
response_parameters.description: Indicate warning details if hit warning. Empty if no warning happened

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_parameters.name: item_id
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item

error_codes.description: The information you provided is not found

notes: The documentation includes multiple URL examples for different regions/environments, request/response examples in JSON format, and comprehensive error handling information. The API appears to be part of a product management system with specific authentication requirements.
